snippet: Ms. Joosten, who became an actress at 42, also played the president’s secretary on “The West Wing” and won two Emmy awards for her performances.
abstract: Kathryn Joosten, TV character actress, dies at age 72.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Joosten, who became an actress at 42, also played the president’s secretary on “The West Wing” and won two Emmy awards for her performances.

headline.seo: Kathryn Joosten, Neighbor on ‘Desperate Housewives,’ Dies at 72
headline.main: Kathryn Joosten, Neighbor on ‘Desperate Housewives,’ Dies at 72
